Tests that the -webkit-column-rule shorthand is computed properly.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".

PASS computedStyle.getPropertyValue('-webkit-column-rule') is "1px dotted rgb(0, 0, 0)"
FAIL computedStyle.getPropertyValue('-webkit-column-rule') should be 10px rgb(255, 0, 0). Was 0px rgb(255, 0, 0).
PASS computedStyle.getPropertyValue('-webkit-column-rule') is "3px dashed rgb(255, 0, 0)"
FAIL computedStyle.getPropertyValue('-webkit-column-rule') should be 10px rgb(0, 0, 255). Was 0px rgb(0, 0, 255).
FAIL computedStyle.getPropertyValue('-webkit-column-rule') should be 10px hidden rgb(0, 0, 255). Was 0px hidden rgb(0, 0, 255).
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
